verbose_text: Moreover, CS and DB predominantly activated intermediate-diameter (20-25 mum) or large-diameter (> 25 mum) DRG neurons, while the light and HP stimuli predominantly activated small-diameter (< 20 mum) DRG neurons (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: HP stimuli predominantly activated small-diameter (<20 mum) DRG
